description.full: Preview and purchase all the hottest downloadable tracks for Lips!
description.short: Lips™ is the ultimate interactive singing experience. Two wireless motion-sensitive microphones pulse and shine as you and your friends sing and party to the hottest songs from the hottest artists. Got flow? Rap to epic hits like “Bust A Move” by Young MC. Got soul? Wow friends on hot new hits like “Mercy” from Duffy. Plus, get more tunes from top artists on Xbox LIVE®, and sing to your DRM-free songs on select music players. Got backup? Get a friend to pick up a mic and sing with you. And, whe…
